item.description:
The winner of the poll for the restaurant of the month of October is VIA Italian Table Restaurant!

The Dinner night will be Thursday, October 16th at around 7pm (depending on when I can get a reservation).

For this event to be successful we need to follow these guidelines...

There is no Maybe's for this event.
RSVP deadline will be 11:45pm on October 14th.
If unsure wait till October 14th to RSVP.
If you RSVP "yes" PLEASE show up on time or a few minutes early, not later.
I WILL be there 15-20 minutes early.
I will give the host(es) my name so when you show up just ask the host for the table for "Mark's meet up group".

**I'm asking each member to consider giving a $2 donation to help me with the meet up fee's.

My phone number is (508) 212-4111.
Please take a moment and enter this number in your cell phone so you have it at all times "just in case".

My goal is to make this a monthly event. We can talk about future events durring any of the events I have including this one.
Did you like the Poll Question or would you rather discuss it at events or just have me plan any event.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll let you know a week before the event
item.name: Dinner Night. VIA Italian Table Restaurant
